Text: Many many thx for your effort bitstream, really awesome old SciFi movies, love it.

Heyas Bit Ole Boy, Outter Limets can be found on many sites by season and with good quaility. I suggest you not waste your Ubar SkillZ (LOL I am 52 years old but can speak GangSta TaLk) on this series. 
      And as you can tell we all luff you and stuff. Great work!!

                Silk

@ Silk...yea I noticed that, but first I searched The Bay and found only a few and as I DON"T GO to those 'other sites' (lol) I didn't know..how's that for gangsta?!  BTW...you still a year younger than me so neener neener!!  lol

Enjoy dammit!!..hehe

Dear bitstreeem, I'm thoroughly enjoying your uploads of golden/cardboarden age vintage SF.

It's also funny that your channel has turned into an old geeky geezers' favourite hangout, a "Captain Proton's Astounding Sanatorium of Cheesy Wonders" of sorts.

Now in Amazing 2D VHS-o-Rama!

Thank you very much and keep up the good work!
Well Klimt....YOU are crakin me up!!  ROFL!! Dam near spit on my keyboard.nnI\'ll do my best of course to keep you deep in \'Amazing 2D VHS-o-Rama!\'  =)nnThanks for the comments and enjoy!!
